remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态类会公开的默认站点地图提供商提供的事件。The static class exposes the event of the default site map provider. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理ASP.NET 网页，若要修改显示由站点导航控件，如的目标 Url 上的事件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event on an ASP.NET Web page to modify the target URLs that are displayed by a site navigation control, such as the control. 在此示例中，当前页是联机公告板或论坛中发布页。In this example, the current page is a post page in an online bulletin board or forum. 为了呈现更有意义站点导航窗格中，通过导航控件显示的节点的 Url 被附加到上下文相关的查询字符串。In order to render more meaningful site navigation, the URLs of the nodes that are displayed by the navigation control are appended with query strings that are relevant to the context. > [!NOTE] > 则可以安全地访问中的属性类。It is safe to access the property from within the class. 在这种情况下，ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构可以防止无限递归。The ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure guards against infinite recursion, in this case. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#1)]
